abstract: Marielle Heller movie The Diary of a Teenage Girl won critical acclaim at its premiere at Sundance Film Festival but faces question of whether wider audiences will respond positively after its general release; film documents discovery of sex by 15-year-old female protagonist, played by Bel Powley.
lead_paragraph: In her adaptation of Phoebe Gloeckner’s illustrated novel, the director Marielle Heller depicts the sexual awakening of a 15-year-old from the girl’s perspective.

headline.main: The Birds and the Bees as Seen at 15, in ‘The Diary of a Teenage Girl’
headline.print_headline: Birds, Bees and Growing Pains at 15

snippet: In her adaptation of Phoebe Gloeckner’s illustrated novel, the director Marielle Heller depicts the sexual awakening of a 15-year-old from the girl’s perspective.
